DOC.criteria: Healthy Men BMI 18.5 27.0 kg/m2 Age 2040 year Intake potato main meal frequent 4 time per week Chronic disease ( know diabetes , cardiovascular disease , irritable bowel disease , colitis ulcerosa , crohn disease , chronic disease could affect result present study ) Gluten allergy Use daily prescription medicine ( mild analgesic allow ) Use lipidlowering agent ( e.g . Becel , HUSK ) Use food supplement relevance study ( pre probiotic ) Irregular intake vitamin /mineral supplement ( two week prior entire study period ) Smoking Elite athlete ( > 10 hour strenuous physical activity per week ) Blood donation ( < 1 month study commencement study period ) Participation clinical study ( < 1 month study commencement study period ) Inability ( physically psychologically ) comply procedure require protocol judge Investigator
